description: The course provides a capstone to the major. Taught as a seminar, it offers an
opportunity for students to integrate their studies of women and gender across
disciplines and to become more aware of the intricate web of gender, race, culture, and
class that informs women's experiences. Offered annually in the spring semester.
Prerequisite: GSS 121; priority given to majors and concentrators.
fullname: Advanced Topics in Gender and Sexuality Studies
